element.name: IfoSQLObject
element.short: Simple interface representing any object that can receive and pass a SQL connector.

element.name: IfoTableObject
element.short: An interface representing an object that contains information about a database table.

element.name: IfoDBObject
element.short: Interface for a type, able to store a connection to a database.
element.descr:
This interface should enable implementing objects, to share a connection with each other.
Could be used across the object groups in fpcORM, since also the metadata objects may need to store a connection.
Should this interface offer to connect to the database aswell? Why should it?
